main_definition: Engineers are individuals who design, build, or maintain structures, machines, systems, or processes using scientific principles.

meanings_and_examples.example: John is an electrical engineer working on developing new technology.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals who contribute to the creation or improvement of something, often metaphorically
meanings_and_examples.example: The marketing team were engineers in their approach to solving customer challenges.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of people working together on a common project, especially one related to design and construction
meanings_and_examples.example: The engineering department collaborated with architects to construct the new building.
